newsfeed.content: We will be presenting a poster: "Advancing Satellite Monitoring of Early-stage Cyanobacterial Harmful Algal Blooms using Inherent Optical Properties and Machine Learning"
We will be presenting a poster: "CyanoSense 2.0: Low-cost Wireless Sensor Network for Real-time Monitoring of Cyanobacterial Harmful Algal Blooms in Smaller Water Bodies"
We will be presenting a poster: "High-Frequency Monitoring of Cyanobacterial Harmful Algal Blooms in Large Inland Waters Using Geostationary Satellite Data"
We will be presenting a paper: "Enhancing CyanoHAB Monitoring Across Multi-Satellite Sensors: Combining Empirical Phycocyanin Algorithms using Machine Learning"
newsfeed.conference: IEEE International Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium 2024

newsfeed.content: We will be presenting a poster: "Advancing Remote Sensing of CyanoHABs - Phycocyanin Estimation using Hyperspectral Inversion and Machine Learning"
newsfeed.conference: NASA's Biodiversity and Ecological Forecasting Annual Meeting 2024
